Synonyms.Synonym: Fenofibrate (Antara, Fenoglide, Lipofen, Tricor, and Triglide)

QAPair.Question: Do you have information about Fibrates
QAPair.Answer: Fibrates are medicines prescribed to help lower high triglyceride levels. Triglycerides are a type of fat in your blood. Fibrates also may help raise your HDL (good) cholesterol . High triglycerides along with low HDL cholesterol increase the risk of heart disease and stroke.
